title: The Kingstone Bible (Kingstone) (incomplete)
description:
OK everyone, we here at the LTS Comic Book Emporium hopes that all of us are enlightened enough to allow for the facts that everyone should be able to enjoy comic books, and that the same topic and/or subject matter can be discussed from many different points of view. Basically, please keep it civil.

All of the Kingstone comics are faith based in the Christian religion, usually dealing directly with a person or story from the Bible. 

-----------------------------------------------------

This one is very incomplete; there's twelve volumes in total and I only have 4 of them here. This is not something I'll be actively searching for, though, so I'm going to upload what I have in hopes somebody else will finish it someday.


The Kingstone Bible V1 The Beginning 
Kingstone Comics, 2014, 133 pages
Written by Art A Ayris, Ben Avery
Illustrated by Danny Bulanadi, Jeff Slemons, Mike Lilly, Geof Isherwood, Jeff Huet, Joe Rubinstein
Colored by Joel Chua, Tom Chu, Andrew Crossley
The beginning of the world, the great flood, the Tower of Babel and the story of Job.

The Kingstone Bible V3 The Ten Commandments
Kingstone Comics, 2014, 109 pages
Written by Art A Ayris, Michael Pearl
Illustrated by Danny Bulanadi
Colored by Matt Baker, Clint Clearly
The story of God's deliverance of the Hebrews from Egypt through the conquest of Canaan.

The Kingstone Bible V4 The Judges
Kingstone Comics, 2014, 119 pages
Written by Art A Ayris
Illustrated by a whole bunch of those guys up above
Colored by a whole bunch of those guys up above
Samson, Deborah, Gideon and the time of the judges in Israel.


The Kingstone Bible V4 The Exile
Kingstone Comics, 2014, 222 pages
Written by Art A Ayris, Ben Avery
Illustrated by a whole bunch of those guys up above
Colored by a whole bunch of those guys up above
The stories of Daniel, Ezra, Nehemiah and Esther during the exile of the Jews
